Citation

Reich NG, Lessler J, Cummings DAT, Brookmeyer R. (2009). Estimating incubation periods with coarse data. Statistics in Medicine. 28(22):2769--2784.

@Article{,
  title = {Estimating incubation periods with coarse data.},
  author = {Nicholas G Reich and Justin Lessler and Derek AT Cummings and Ron Brookmeyer},
  journal = {Statistics in Medicine},
  year = {2009},
}

Reich NG, Lessler J, Cummings DAT, Brookmeyer R. Estimating absolute and relative case fatality ratios from infectious disease surveillance data. Biometrics. 2012, 68(2): 598--606.

@Article{,
  title = {Estimating absolute and relative case fatality ratios from infectious disease surveillance data.},
  author = {Nicholas G Reich and Justin Lessler and Derek AT Cummings and Ron Brookmeyer},
  journal = {Biometrics},
  year = {2012},
}

Reich NG, Lessler J, Azman AS. (2025). coarseDataTools: A collection of functions to help with analysis of coarsely observed data. <http://nickreich.github.io/coarseDataTools/>. R package version 0.7.2.
